title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When the CVS repository view is opened in the Java perspective, and the title bar is double-clicked to maximize it, switching to the resource perspective and then back to the Java perspective causes the view to lose its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should retain its maximized state even when switching perspectives.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double-click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the resource perspective. 4. Switch back to the Java perspective.
